Row.Text: +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production, on the Palace and City Hall on Islands (a landmass with a maximum of 15 tiles). Ageless. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land, this land must be an Island.

+3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on the Palace and City Hall on Islands (a landmass with a maximum of 15 tiles).[N]Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land, this land must be an Island.
Mother of my house, don't you stir. You shall wait for the setting of sunset glow, when gone to sleep is the surface of the sea.
